Class WauzPlayerTrade

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzcore.players.WauzPlayerTrade

  • public class WauzPlayerTrade
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to let two players trade with each other.
    Author:
    eddshine

    • Method Detail

      • canTrade

        public static boolean canTrade(org.bukkit.entity.Player requestingPlayer,
                               org.bukkit.entity.Player requestedPlayer)
        Checks if a player can trade with another player.
        Parameters:
        requestingPlayer - The player who wants to send the trade request.
        requestedPlayer - The player that is requested.
        Returns:
        If a trade request is possible.

      • tryToTrade

        public static boolean tryToTrade(org.bukkit.entity.Player requestingPlayer,
                                 java.lang.String requestedPlayerName)
        Tries to trade with another player. If no request was sent before, one will be sent and must be confirmed first.
        Parameters:
        requestingPlayer - The player who wants to trade.
        requestedPlayerName - The name of the player that should be traded with.
        Returns:
        If the trade window was opened or a request was sent.
        See Also:
        canTrade(Player, Player), WauzNmsClient.nmsChatCommand(Player, String, String, boolean), TradeMenu.onTrade(Player, Player)
